### Import Code

```

```
<br/>

### How to Install

Once you've imported the code you can either add it to the end of your current First Words Action with the `Add Sub Action >> Actions >> Run Action`

You can also add this action directly to the Event. This Event can be found at `Platforms >> Twitch >> Events >> General >> First Words`

If all this is done correctly this should be installed.

<br/>

### How to Configure

In order to add a new user all you need to do is create an Action called `[FW]-` followed by there name. So if you wanted to create one for me the action would be called `[FW]-TerrierDarts`.

In the main action you imported there is also a part at the bottom where you can add the parts of the default action so things can run if a non-custom user walks in.
